list.sql: SELECT SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS id,name,account from vw_sys_user  where disabled=0
select SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS role_id,role_key,role_name from fw_roles where role_id not in (select role_id from fw_userrole where user_id='@query.user_id@') and rec_isdeleted=0
select SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS id,name,account from vw_sys_user mu where id not in (select user_id from fw_userrole where role_id='@query.role_id@')

select SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS * from (select id,name,0 as type,'用户' as typename from vw_sys_user union select role_id as id,role_name as name,1 as type,'角色' as typename from fw_roles where rec_isdeleted=0) item where (1=1)
select SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS district_id,district_name,district_index from bas_district where rec_isdeleted=0 and district_level=@query.level@
select user_logo,user_id as id,user_name as name  from crm_user where 1=1
select SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS app_id as id, app_name as name from bas_wechat_publicinfo wp where 1=1
select SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS music_id as id, music_title as title,music_file as file from bas_red_music  where music_enabled=1
